data.title: Go for the champagne
data.text: The brunch is ok.  We go for the champagne brunch on Sunday's.  we have been at both locations.  I wouldn't say this is a place I would go on a regular basis.

data.title: Adequate Mexican Food
data.text:
This location is in the Restaurant Row of the Antelope Valley Mall, was Johnny Carrinos previously. The decor is nice, there is a bar also.  We thought we'd like to dine in the bar as we thought we could watch sports.  There are only a couple of monitors so every seat does not have a good view of the tv. I don't recommend the bar if you really want to watch an event as the bar is large enough it is also very noisy and hot.  We went on a Friday after work.  The happy hour prices higher here than their other locations.  We decided to eat in the restaurant as the bar was entirely too hot.
The wait staff is very attentive, the food arrives in a short period of time and looks and taste great!  It is somewhat expensive for Mexican food but no higher than any other restaurant in this area.  Go for the food but definately not to watch sports.

data.title: Absolutely our favorite Mexican restaurant
data.text: Have been coming here for years, we're regulars and the food has always been good. Their lunch specials are excellent and a bargain plus they have a lunch buffet and also a brunch on the weekends. Very good service, good sized menu featuring dinners, lunches, Mexican specialities and some seafood, mostly  shrimp and various styles of fish plus fish or seafood soup which comes in a huge bowl and is a complete meal in itself. My wife also likes the whole seasoned fried fish which is quite large and covers one of their large dinner plates. Of course you get complimentary warm chips and salsa which is always good and they will refill both. We've tried a few other local Mexican places but Medrano's has always been our favorite so I doubt that we'll go anywhere else in the future.

data.title: Great food and excellent service!!
data.text: This was my "go to" mexican food place when I lived in Lancaster.  Excellent service every time we ate there and the food was the close to the best in the Antelope Valley.  Great value and very consistent.

data.title: Grown up fun!
data.text: Nice late night spot to eat and chill with friends. Karaoke was popping that night and everyone had fun. Staff was extra cool. I'll be back.

data.title: Expensive for the quality of food
data.text: We went for Christmas.  The meal was very expensive and really not worth the money.  The service was slow.  The drinks did look good, but again very pricey.

data.title: Our favorite place to eat Mexcian food
data.text: When we go out for Mexican food in the high desert this is the place to go. The service is always great and so is the food. Love the Albondigas Soup and the Chili Rellano's  are the best. Would recommend this place to anyone who like good food.

data.title: A good place to enjoy your family & friends ~
data.text: Excellent service and food. The all you can eat Buffett had so many delicious items to choose from. I will return ~

data.title: Average
data.text:
The food is Just average. Margarita too sweet.
Worst part as we were having dinner the waiter gave us our bill immediately since he is leaving. We felt bring hurried . The manager apologized but I already felt bad. 
I still recommend this place but it will take me a long time to return.

data.title: Great Food
data.text:
We had dinner there on a Saturday nite about 5:00 pm and the service was fast and quick. The food was great.
They treated the fours of us like royalty

data.title: Salsa
data.text: Medrano has the best chips and salsa in town and great guacamole. The food at medrano a is excellent and staff can't say enough great things about them especially Jesus and Chrystal and  not to take away from anyone else. They are all very attentive to your need. Lunch menu inexpensive and on Saturdays the buffet from 11:00-2:00 is excellent . So Chip and Salsa your way into Medranos Mexican  Restuarant !

data.title: Awesome Mexican Food
data.text: One of my favorite things to do is go to karaoke night on Thursdays during happy hour.  They have awesome appetizer plates and tall mugs of beer.

data.title: Dinner out of Los Angeles
data.text: Traveling late north or south this is an interesting place for a good meal. I had the steak enchiladas and my wife a chicken enchilada taco rice and beans.   My daughter had one of their specialties fajita burrito. All were good and the service was exceptional with speedy as a plus. The whole inside is painted like a Mexican village. They have a bar and a huge screen tv. She gave me a 20% senior discount to make the value even  better. We ate in Lancaster but they have two more as well.

data.title: Fun Fun Fun
data.text: If you wanna have fun and have a couple of drinks and hear people sing this is the place to go and enjoy yourself with a group of friends.

data.title: Good Food and Atmosphere!
data.text: I love all the wall murals and decorations Medranos features. The food is great and good portions as well. Good place for couples and families.

data.title: Wonderful flavors
data.text: We fed 25 people at a table - excellent service considering that obstacle.  And my dish was fantastic, different than the usual Americanized Mexican fare - shrimp and avacados served hot in a fresh tasting red sauce.  Great salsa too!

data.title: excellent for Happy Hour.
data.text: Generous, friendly waitstaff eager to know how to make you a happy customer.  Decent food at fair prices.

data.title: 2nd best shredded beef tacos I have had
data.text: Great Shredded beef hard shell tacos.  The closest to my favorite El Toreo hard shell tacos.  If the salsa had a little more kick I would give them a tie.  Excellent food.

data.title: Great Mexican Food, moderate prices
data.text: I live in Lancaster and eat in Medranos at least once a month. Their lunches are great but their Monday night buffet is the best in town. You can order either off of the menu or eat the buffet . The buffet currently runs $8.50 and includes everything but a drink. They do have pricing for kids. I think that their food is one of the top 3 for Mexican food in the whole Antelope Valley.

data.title: Great Sunday brunch!  HUGE selection of standard brunch food and authentic Mexican. . . who doesn't love a good corn...
data.text: Great Sunday brunch!  HUGE selection of standard brunch food and authentic Mexican. . . who doesn't love a good corn dog with their breakfast??  But seriously, food and selection are awesome.
